content:
I have been continuing my analysis of the FHIR Medication.Request message data structure and especially the dose timing/frequency datasets/datacodes and have enhanced a spreadsheet previously posted on the 'implementers' stream. I think the spreadsheet might be a useful HL7 training resource to understand this significant change from HL7v2 to HL7 FHIR timing.repeat message structure (of particular interest to the Pharmacy work group?).

HL7-Medication-Request-Dose-Timing-Frequencies-with-table-structure-20180704.xlsx
thanks, that's pretty useful. can I post it to my blog so that people can find it?
Not particularly. My credit will be when all UK primary care prescriptions are created and messaged using the HL7 FHIR medication dose syntax ;-)
@Andrew Gledhill looks like we may be revisiting dose syntax again at NHS Digital. I'll be looking closely at your work here - thanks
